snippet: Bernardo Paz, a mining magnate, employs 1,000 people at Inhotim, his 5,000-acre complex of contemporary art and exotic gardens.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Bernardo Paz, a mining magnate who employs 1,000 people at Inhotim, his 5,000-acre complex of contemporary art and exotic gardens in Brazil.
lead_paragraph: Bernardo Paz, a mining magnate, employs 1,000 people at Inhotim, his 5,000-acre complex of contemporary art and exotic gardens.
